Veselnitskaya told Fox News the Trump Tower meeting lasted about half an hour and centered around the 2012 Magnitsky Act, a law that punishes Russian officials – including Prevezon’s boss - with tough sanctions following the 2009 death Sergei Magnitsky in a Russian prison.
